constantValues: Note that is attached to one or more objects, including other notes.

members.name: objectTypeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Type of entity with which the note is associated.

members.description: Type of entity with which the note is associated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'objectTypeCode_display' is added to the 'Note' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'objectTypeCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: objectTypeCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: owningUser

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who owns the note.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the note.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the object with which the note is associated.

constantValues: The name of the entity linked by objectId

foreignKeyAttribute.name: owningBusinessUnit

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the note.

members.name: isDocument

constantValues: Specifies whether the note is an attachment.

members.description: Specifies whether the note is an attachment.

members.name: mimeType

constantValues: MIME type of the note's attachment.

members.description: MIME type of the note's attachment.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the note was created.

members.description: Date and time when the note was created.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the note.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the note.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the note.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the note.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the note was last modified.

members.name: stepId

constantValues: workflow step id associated with the note.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the annotation.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the annotation.
